name: Asteroids (itch) (Brendan Keogh)
description:
A simple Asteroids clone I made over the course of two short plane trips this weekend. Only real difference is I've added colours and it is possible to shoot yourself. Try not to do that. 

Left and right arrows - rotate

Up arrow - thrust

z - shoot

(In 2017 I am challenging myself to make 50 little videogames to get more familiar with the tools. I make no guarantee that any of the games are good, but that's not really the point. This is game #20 of 50.)
